title: Ugh
text: I’m 25 days postop, on soft foods and actually able to eat really well. I’m down 16lbs, it was 19lbs but somehow I’ve gained 3lbs?! No idea how. I’m hitting protein, hitting water, eating around 700 calories and still avoiding carbs (the only carby thing I eat so far are canned peas and that’s for the fiber) what is going on 😩😩
